page.title: 15BUCKLAND NEWTON GARAGE
page.content: The garage is much larger and busier than it used to be due to the increase in traffic.The garage offers car repairs,a breakdown service,new tyres, exhausts ,sweets and cigarettes. Improvements have been made to the garage with new equipment.They have a new M.O.T testing bay, tuning equipment,a new ramp,a workshop and a new canopy. It started as a cycle shop. The owner was Mr.Candy.Then Mr.Knight bought it and did agricultural repairs. Mr.Seeward brought it in 1976 and started doing car repairs.The busiest days of the week are Saturdays and Mondays. Saturdays are busy for selling petrol and Mondays for repairs.The busiest time of the year is the Winter because cars need more attention.
